body_text:
The issue between Pure/Components is with regard to Ant's form/error handling. Ant uses plain JS objects for the form and formErrors props, which doesn't play well with PureComponent.
This page, however, shouldn't have been switched back to Component. I've gone through and corrected this. As for documenting when to use Pure vs regular components, I'd prefer to place that in some sort of centralized location, versus including the comment in each of the ~5 files. Any suggestions on that?
